title: Power - how much of battery 30 W is in R0 with 2I0

content.question: Three identical resistors, each of resistance <math alttext="R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, are connected to a battery as shown in the figure. The current in each resistor is as indicated. If the battery transfers energy to the circuit at a rate of <math alttext="30 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>W</mtext></math>, what is the power dissipated in the resistor that has a current of <math alttext="2 I sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
